alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Karnes (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 1:57AM CDT until May 16 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge affecting Karnes and Goliad Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 34.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:15 AM CDT Sunday was 34.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 34.8 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 35.9 feet on 04/08/2023. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed San Antonio River Hwy 72 nr Runge 27.0 34.3 Sun 1 am CDT 30.2 24.9 21.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 200 PM CDT.
